In February, Variety ran a major story and tweeted about Kobalt's new relationship with the Miles Davis family estate. Steve Chagollan, Asst. Managing Editor of the leading entertainment trade wrote about how a new deal was struck for Kobalt to administer the entire catalog of the late icon and help bring the catalogue to future generations.

Chagollan wrote: "Miles Davis Properties LLC called Kobalt a 'forward-thinking' company that 'puts the artists’ needs at the forefront.' 

For the complete story, go to: http://variety.com/2014/biz/news/indie-music-publisher-kobalt-gets-into-the-miles-davis-business-1201090199/
